entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
